text: The women's 150 + 300 + 450 + 600 medley relay event at the 1967 European Indoor Games was held on 12 March in Prague. The first athlete ran one lap of the 150-metre track, the second two, the third three and the anchor four, thus 10 laps or 1500 metres in total. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Valentyna Bolshova Vera Popkova Tatyana Arnautova Nadeshda Syeropegina || 3:35.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Marijana Lubej Ika Maričić Ljiljana Petnjarić Gizela Farkaš || 3:37.5 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Eva Lehocká Anna Majtanová Anna Chmelková Vera Busová || || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1967 European Indoor Games – Women's medley relay
